stepTitle: Elvira and Aletheia live $$3.1$$ miles apart on the same street. They are in a study group that meets at a coffee shop between their houses. It took Elvira half an hour and Aletheia two-thirds of an hour to walk to the coffee shop. Aletheia's speed is $$0.6$$ miles per hour slower than Elvira's speed. Find both women's walking speeds.
